email_log.subject: Tokyo Weather Update: Mild & Cloudy with High Humidity
email_log.body:
Hi there!

Here's your Tokyo weather update for today:

It's a mild 61¬∞F in Tokyo with broken cloud coverage (75% of the sky). While the temperature is comfortable, the high humidity (93%) might make it feel a bit sticky outside. Winds are gentle at 8 mph, and visibility is good at 10 km.

Today's sun schedule:
Sunrise: 1:57 PM
Sunset: 12:53 AM

Recommendations for today:
- Light layers are ideal for the moderate temperature
- Consider bringing a light jacket as cloud cover may increase
- Pack a small umbrella - high humidity and cloud coverage suggest possible light rain
- Anti-frizz hair products might be helpful due to the humidity

Note: The high humidity levels may make it feel warmer than the actual temperature. If you're planning outdoor activities, stay hydrated and choose breathable clothing.

Have a great day in Tokyo!

Best regards,
Your Weather Team

email_log.body:
Hello from Tokyo!

It's a wet one today with moderate rain and temperatures at 61¬∞F. The high humidity (93%) and continuous rainfall (3.94mm in the last hour) are making for quite damp conditions. Visibility is reduced to 8km, so please take extra care when traveling.

What to expect:
‚Ä¢ Moderate rain continuing
‚Ä¢ Cool, humid conditions
‚Ä¢ Light winds at 9 mph
‚Ä¢ Cloudy skies (75% coverage)
‚Ä¢ Sunset expected at 12:53 AM

Recommendations for today:
‚Ä¢ Bring a sturdy umbrella and raincoat
‚Ä¢ Wear water-resistant footwear
‚Ä¢ Consider indoor activities if possible
‚Ä¢ Allow extra time for commuting due to wet conditions

Weather Alert: The combination of moderate rain and high humidity may cause slippery conditions. Please exercise caution when walking on wet surfaces.
